alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 9:35PM EDT until April 02 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Bedford to Williams and White River at Hazleton to Petersburg. .While flooding continues along much of the White River and East fork of the White River, levels have crested and are steadily beginning to fall. More precipitation is in the forecast and this will result in prolonged flooding including a secondary rise in levels bringing some locations back above flood stage by early to mid next week. Those with interests along area waterways should monitor forecasts for the latest information. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River near Bedford. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.7 feet, Water is at the top corner of the Bedford Boat Club Shoot House near the base. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 5.0 feet Tuesday, April 11. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
